name: The Stupid And Dumb Adventure To Do Something (The Egg Muncher)
name_original: The Stupid And Dumb Adventure To Do Something (The Egg Muncher)
description:
!!!This game requires you to install the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP to play the game! You can install it by clicking here!

Welcome to the stupid and dumb adventure to do something. in this game, you play as ps2 kiryu, gordon freeman, shrek, and mario. You are sent on a quest by modern kiryu with no context.

THIS GAME HAS:

Bobs' that love the Greek alphabet!

An evil paino!

A town full of the oddest people you'll ever see!

Sans!

Luigi

Lot's of banger music!

Secret bosses!

The BBQ pit boys!

A dargoon daldoo!

A whole secret side quest with great rewards!

Mario and his crippling addiction to shrooms!

A fuckton of references to other games!
